Send a companion on an individual mission or attaches them to a group to depart later Set submap_coords and pos.

Parameters
descis the description in the popup window
miss_idis the value stored with the NPC when it is offloaded
groupis whether the NPC is waiting for additional members before departing together
equipmentis placed in the NPC's special inventory and dropped when they return
skill_testedis the main skill for the quest
skill_levelis checked to prevent lower level NPCs from going on missions Send a companion on an individual mission or attaches them to a group to depart later
